reviewText: Got this for my grandson as we have lots of bees in the yard. The informaiton was good for me and the pictures great for the young ones. Good for many ages.
Title: NOVA: Bees - Tales From the Hive

reviewText: My wife and I are beekeepers and can't seem to learn enough about these sweet little 6 legged creatures.  In this well put together video you will get an excellent understanding about a life in year of a bee hive.  The video is breathe taking.  We will carefully lend this to friends but most that are beekeepers will want it for their own to watch again and again.  Keep the buzz going.NOVA: Bees - Tales From the Hive
summary: Rented the video and then bought it on Amazon
Title: NOVA: Bees - Tales From the Hive

reviewText: Super DVD. If  you are the least interested in bees this is the DVD to see. They are such incredible creatures.
Title: NOVA: Bees - Tales From the Hive

reviewText: My wife and I became beekeepers just over a year ago before we bought this DVD.  I wish we had bought it earlier.  It provides an excellent overview and introduction to bees.  The photography is stunning.
Title: NOVA: Bees - Tales From the Hive

reviewText: This dvd was used in our bee school this past spring, and worth seeing again!  a a a a a
summary: Nove Bees - Tales from the hive
Title: NOVA: Bees - Tales From the Hive
